content.rendered:
All you need to know about PUBG MOBILE INDIA

PUBG Mobile India was officially announced on 12-Nov-2020 on their official Instagram handle. the day it was announced every PUBG lover felt very excitement.

PUBG Mobile India is an alternative of PUBG Mobile main version (owned by Tencent Games) so Indian govt. banned game in 2020 and thereafter PUBG CORP (owner of PUBG) announced this India specific version for India region on their Instagram handle.

PUBG unban in India

Right now PUBG Mobile India has registered its company in India and has already met all the conditions,(it has also appointed and Indian chairperson who is also chairman for other several outside India companies) due to which it was previously banned and also there is no Tencent Games involvement that is no CHINA involvement.

But for now PUBG Mobile India is seeming nowhere to release in India as Govt. and MEITY (Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology) as they did not find the PUBG Mobile India policies and hence,

“RIGHT NOW IT DOES NOT SEEM THAT PUBG MOBILE INDIA IS GOING TO RELEASE IN INDIA ANYTIME SOON“.
